entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 16 March 2023
